Question
========

A complete set of 52 playing cards contains 26 red and 26 black cards. We randomly choose four cards from a standard suit. The first three cards chosen are all red. The conditional probability that the fourth one is also red is equal to:

Answerlist
----------

* 3/26
* 23/49
* 26/52
* 26/26

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3/26: Incorrect
* 23/49: Correct
* 26/52: Incorrect
* 26/26: Incorrect
